Class TileBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Buffer
      • TileBuffer

  • public class TileBuffer
extends Buffer
    The TileBuffer class is used for taking information from the Tile components of the game and formatting it into a display.

    TileBuffer

    Date: 2016/05/26

    Version:
    1 2016/05/26
    Author:
    David White and Sepehr Hosseini

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Buffer

        tileSize, view

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TileBuffer(Tile[][] tiles, int width, int height, int tileSize)
      This constructs an instance of the TileBuffer class with the specified Tile array, the specified width and height, and the specified Tile size.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void centerView(int x, int y)
      This method centers the view of the buffer around the specified x and y coordinates in relation to the Tile components.
      void redraw()
      This method redraws all the Tiles from the Tile array.
      void setBuffer(Tile[][] tiles)
      This method resets the buffer to buffer tiles from the specified Tile array.
      void update()
      This method redraws only the animated Tiles from the Tile array.

      • Methods inherited from class Buffer

        getView, renderHeight, renderWidth

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TileBuffer

        public TileBuffer(Tile[][] tiles,
                  int width,
                  int height,
                  int tileSize)
        This constructs an instance of the TileBuffer class with the specified Tile array, the specified width and height, and the specified Tile size.
        Parameters:
        tiles[][] - the array of Tiles to be rendered by the class.
        width - this is the width of the screen this class is buffering for in pixels.
        height - this is the height of the screen this class is buffering for in pixels.
        tileSize - the specified size of the game components in pixels.

    • Method Detail

      • centerView

        public void centerView(int x,
                       int y)
        This method centers the view of the buffer around the specified x and y coordinates in relation to the Tile components.
        Specified by:
        centerView in class Buffer
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate.
        y - the y coordinate.

      • redraw

        public void redraw()
        This method redraws all the Tiles from the Tile array.

        Local variables:

        g2D Reference to the Graphics2D class which will be used to draw images onto the screen.

      • setBuffer

        public void setBuffer(Tile[][] tiles)
        This method resets the buffer to buffer tiles from the specified Tile array.
        Parameters:
        tiles[][] - the specified Tile array.

      • update

        public void update()
        This method redraws only the animated Tiles from the Tile array.

        Local variables:

        g2D Reference to the Graphics2D class which will be used to draw images onto the screen.

        Specified by:
        update in class Buffer
